coverLetter: Hi my name is valerie. I have budtender experience. I am in love with the cannabis industry. I have been around cannabis all my life and im all for the natural way. I truly belive cannabis is medicinal and good for the soul. Work ethic wise, i am very determined, self motivated, and somewhat a perfectionist. I am very sociable, outgoing, and pleasant to be around. I have great customer service skills and very respectful.
